title: Mr. and Mrs. Bo Jo Jones
description: Note: This edition has no ISBNthey're just kids and they're in trouble. The kind of trouble you don't tell your parents about until you've fixed it--one way or another.It's the end of high school, football, and college for Bo jo Jones. He's about to become a father. It's farewell to proms, expensive dresses, and the pretty life her parents have already planned for July Greher. But maybe she's one of the lucky ones: at least her child will be legitimate.An head has written an extraordinary novel of two nice young people--too soon adults. Quietly and humorously told, it is a storu of real people, real situations . . . and real solutions.[Text above quoted from back cover]
author: Ann Head
